name: nanoSame
description:
Roguelike puzzle game written for #lowrezjam 22

How to play Destroy all enemies using the tiles on the grid, more tiles popped == more damage. Clearing a column will refill grid from the right.
  • Sword: physical, can only target 1st enemy
  • Ice: chance to freeze
  • Fire: also damages nearby enemies
  • Heart: heal player
  • Gold: spend between waves, no bonus when popping multiples

left click on grid pops matching tiles, left click on hero opens inventory, left click on enemy sets spell target.

Spend gold between waves for bonuses, get a random inventory item every 5 waves.

  slime - chance to split

  bat - lifesteal

  spider - poisonous
  goblin - will steal gold

  orc - uses shields

  goblin shaman - heals allies

   skeleton archer - sharpshooter
  skeleton warrior - uses bigger shields   skull - left behind by skeletons

  necromancer - summons skeletons

  lost soul - will get stronger each turn

   imp - chance to explode

  demon knight - ultimate opponent

###

not quite finished (of course), currently only fully playable with mouse controls

some missing features:

  • bossfights
  • more perks
  • better item system
  • sounds

enjoy and comment if you want to see a more complete version of this game or have any suggestions.
